snippet: Charles Haley was frequently described as talented but troubled. Specific instances of his bizarre behavior have been well established. On the field, however, Haley was a Hall of Famer.
abstract: Charles Haley was frequently described as talented but troubled. Specific instances of his bizarre behavior have been well established. On the field, however, Haley was a Hall of Famer.
lead_paragraph: The Pro Football Hall of Fame selection committee has narrowed the list of 26 semifinalists to the group of 15 modern-era finalists who will be considered for the class of 2012. The list is at the bottom of this post.

headline.main: A Vote for Charles Haley; Pick Your Hall of Famers
